A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the better Star Wars movie's I've seen. Lots of powerful metaphors. Music was exceptional. Can tell they threw a lot of $ into the production. Particularly\, Benicio del Toro shows the range of his ability as an actor. Movie was suspenseful\, ending was predictable. Porgs were adorable. The scene when Rey (Daisy Ridley) arms got locked up during her battle alongside Kylo Ren (Adam Driver) and she drops the light saber from one hand to the next was bad ass.
